speaker.whotheyare: Adrian K. Haugabrook is working to rethink and redesign higher education.
speaker.whylisten: As executive vice president and managing director for the Social Impact Collective at Southern New Hampshire University (SNHU), Adrian K. Haugabrook works to drive access, equity and opportunity for marginalized populations in education. He cultivates strategic public-private partnerships to extend SNHU's offerings and curricula to new learners. He mitigates systemic, persistent and pervasive barriers by providing innovations in processes, systems and products that dramatically improve the impact and reach of higher education.
